cse.name: Computer Science Engineering (AI & ML)
cse.tagline: Leading the digital transformation with cutting-edge AI and ML technologies

overview.introduction: The Department of Computer Science Engineering with specialization in AI & Machine Learning is committed to preparing students for the technological challenges of tomorrow.
overview.description: Our program offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers fundamental computer science principles along with specialized courses in artificial intelligence, machine learning, data science, and neural networks. Students gain hands-on experience through projects, internships, and industry collaborations, equipping them with the skills needed to thrive in this rapidly evolving field.

programs.name: B.Tech in CSE (AI & ML)
programs.description: A comprehensive undergraduate program that combines core computer science subjects with specialized courses in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

labs.name: AI & Machine Learning Lab
labs.description: Dedicated laboratory equipped with high-performance computing systems and latest AI/ML software tools.
equipment: NVIDIA GPU Servers for Deep Learning

labs.name: Computer Networks Lab
labs.description: Modern networking lab for practical learning of computer network concepts and protocols.

achievements: Ranked among top 50 CSE departments in India
100% placement record for the last 3 years
Industry partnerships with leading tech companies

contact.location: Block A, First Floor, GEC Barmer Campus

electrical.name: Electrical Engineering
electrical.tagline: Powering the future with innovative electrical solutions

overview.introduction: The Department of Electrical Engineering focuses on power systems, control systems, and electrical machines.
overview.description: Our program provides a strong foundation in electrical engineering principles while emphasizing practical applications in power systems, control systems, and electrical machines. Students work with modern equipment and software tools to gain hands-on experience in the field.

programs.name: B.Tech in Electrical Engineering
programs.description: A comprehensive program covering power systems, control systems, and electrical machines.

labs.name: Power Systems Lab
labs.description: Advanced laboratory for power system analysis and simulation.

labs.name: Control Systems Lab
labs.description: Modern laboratory for control system design and implementation.

contact.location: Block B, First Floor, GEC Barmer Campus

mechanical.name: Mechanical Engineering
mechanical.tagline: Designing the future through mechanical innovation

overview.introduction: The Department of Mechanical Engineering focuses on design, manufacturing, and thermal engineering.
overview.description: Our program provides comprehensive training in mechanical systems design, manufacturing processes, and thermal engineering. Students gain practical experience through industry projects and internships.

programs.name: B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering
programs.description: A comprehensive program covering mechanical design, manufacturing, and thermal engineering.

labs.name: CAD/CAM Lab
labs.description: Modern laboratory for computer-aided design and manufacturing.

labs.name: Thermal Engineering Lab
labs.description: Advanced laboratory for thermal system analysis and testing.

contact.location: Block C, First Floor, GEC Barmer Campus

civil.name: Civil Engineering
civil.tagline: Building tomorrow's infrastructure with sustainable solutions

overview.introduction: The Department of Civil Engineering focuses on infrastructure development and sustainable construction practices.
overview.description: Our program provides comprehensive training in structural engineering, transportation, environmental engineering, and construction management. Students gain practical experience through field visits and industry projects.

programs.name: B.Tech in Civil Engineering
programs.description: A comprehensive program covering structural engineering, transportation, and environmental engineering.

labs.name: Structural Engineering Lab
labs.description: Advanced laboratory for structural analysis and testing.

labs.name: Environmental Engineering Lab
labs.description: Modern laboratory for water and wastewater analysis.

achievements: Industry partnerships with leading construction companies

contact.location: Block D, First Floor, GEC Barmer Campus

chemical.name: Chemical Engineering
chemical.tagline: Transforming raw materials into valuable products

overview.introduction: The Department of Chemical Engineering focuses on process engineering and industrial chemistry.
overview.description: Our program provides comprehensive training in chemical processes, unit operations, and industrial chemistry. Students gain practical experience through industry internships and research projects.

programs.name: B.Tech in Chemical Engineering
programs.description: A comprehensive program covering chemical processes, unit operations, and industrial chemistry.

labs.name: Process Engineering Lab
labs.description: Advanced laboratory for chemical process analysis and optimization.

labs.name: Industrial Chemistry Lab
labs.description: Modern laboratory for industrial chemical analysis and synthesis.

achievements: Industry partnerships with leading chemical companies

contact.location: Block E, First Floor, GEC Barmer Campus

electronics.name: Electronics Engineering
electronics.tagline: Innovating through electronic systems and communication

overview.introduction: The Department of Electronics Engineering focuses on electronic systems and communication technologies.
overview.description: Our program provides comprehensive training in electronic devices, circuits, and communication systems. Students gain practical experience through industry projects and research work.

programs.name: B.Tech in Electronics Engineering
programs.description: A comprehensive program covering electronic devices, circuits, and communication systems.

labs.name: Electronics Lab
labs.description: Advanced laboratory for electronic circuit design and testing.

labs.name: Communication Systems Lab
labs.description: Modern laboratory for communication system analysis and testing.

achievements: Industry partnerships with leading electronics companies

contact.location: Block F, First Floor, GEC Barmer Campus

petroleum.name: Petroleum Engineering
petroleum.tagline: Exploring and producing energy resources efficiently

overview.introduction: The Department of Petroleum Engineering focuses on oil and gas exploration and production.
overview.description: Our program provides comprehensive training in petroleum exploration, drilling, production, and reservoir engineering. Students gain practical experience through industry internships and field visits.

programs.name: B.Tech in Petroleum Engineering
programs.description: A comprehensive program covering petroleum exploration, drilling, and production.

labs.name: Drilling Engineering Lab
labs.description: Advanced laboratory for drilling operations and well design.

labs.name: Reservoir Engineering Lab
labs.description: Modern laboratory for reservoir characterization and simulation.

achievements: Industry partnerships with leading oil and gas companies

contact.location: Block G, First Floor, GEC Barmer Campus
